definition: to replace with sth new/to upgrade
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
out with the old and in with the new (idiom)

sentences.english: Bottle turn the star moves, years alternate, old E Er is much this now is changed new colour.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，岁月更迭，古老的鄂尔多斯今朝换新颜。

sentences.english: We will continue to implement the policies of providing subsidies for rural residents to purchase home appliances and subsidies for trading-in old home appliances for new ones.
sentences.chinese: 继续实施家电下乡和以旧换新政策。

sentences.english: My mom is 70 years old, and she wants to trade in her old car for a new one.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈七十岁了，她想把她的车以旧换新。

sentences.english: This is a facelift of what we already have.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个我们已经旧貌换新颜。

sentences.english: Makes black night beauteous, and her old face new.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜因你美丽旧貌换新样。

sentences.english: A fresh coat of paint will dress up the old house.
sentences.chinese: 刷层新油漆会使这房子旧貌换新颜。

sentences.english: Is the Shenyang gold trade-in family appropriate?
sentences.chinese: 沈阳黄金以旧换新哪家合适？

definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to revamp/a face-lift/to retread (a tire)/to refurbish (old clothes)/newly emerging
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
to scrap/to be written off
guarantee period/warranty period
to wear out (tools)
reform and renewal/generational change
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
consumables
to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to unpick and wash (e.g. padded garment)
to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to buy/to purchase
to buy/to acquire/to add to one's possessions
to rust/to grow rusty/to corrode/oxidization
